description: This data set shows the point location of evacuation shelters within the City of Baltimore and list their classification as either primary or secondary. These data were created in the Spring of 2007 from a list of shelters provided to EGIS from OEM. The completeness and currentness of these data are unknown

name: Evacuation Shelters
